name: Spiky Shroom
effect: If you have the lowest score this round at the end of scoring, you may add a Hazard token to another player's Escape Route.

name: A Bone to Flick
effect: Discard up to 3 cards and add a Hazard token to another player's Escape Route.

name: Rock Candy
effect: During scoring this round, add 2 points to your score for each Hazard card in your Hazard Area.

name: Molotov Crocktail
effect: You may remove a Hazard card from your Hazard Area.

name: Suck Up
effect: If you have the lowest score this round at the end of scoring, you may remove a Hazard token from your Escape Route.

name: Coconut Bolas
effect: If you have the highest score this round at the end of scoring, you may add a Hazard token to another player's Escape Route.

name: Epic Flail
effect: You cannot play Instant cards this round.
